title: Augusta County: Jedediah Hotchkiss to Sara A. Hotchkiss, July 15, 1862
summary: Hotchkiss writes to tell his wife that he will not be able to go home for a visit as planned, because of possible battle activity near Gordonsville, in which Jackson's troops will be needed.
keywords: Military Authority, Troop Movement, Church/Religious Activity, American Civil War
